title: NFL suspends Broncos player indefinitely for gambling on games
description: The NFL has indefinitely suspended Denver Broncos defensive lineman Eyioma Uwazurike for betting on league games during the 2022 season

title: DOJ sues Texas, Abbott over 'unauthorized' anti-migration barriers in Rio Grande
description: The Department of Justice on Monday sued the state of Texas and Gov. Greg Abbott over the installation of a barrier of buoys in the Rio Grande River

title: Carlee Russell's disappearance was 'hoax'; charges possible, police say
description: Carlee Russell, the Alabama woman who reportedly had gone missing earlier this month while looking for a toddler, was never missing, authorities said on Monday.

title: K-9 officer put on leave after police dog attacks surrendering suspect
description: An Ohio K-9 officer has been put on administrative leave after his dog was captured on body-camera footage attacking a suspect with his hands up.

title: Former Columbia University OB-GYN to be sentenced for sexual abuse conviction
description: The former gynecologist, who was convicted for abusing four patients, including two pregnant women, is slated to be sentenced.

title: WATCH:  Boy diagnosed with leukemia gets emotional as he leaves hospital cancer-free
description: We're so happy for you, Pierce!

title: Gilgo Beach murders: Police searching suspect's walk-in vault
description: Police are digging up the backyard of Gilgo Beach, New York, murder suspect Rex Heuermann.

title: Challenge to Florida drag shows law won't go to trial until next spring
description: Trial will determine if new Florida law targeting drag shows is constitutional.

title: South Korea says North Korea fired ballistic missile into sea
description: South Korea says North Korea fired ballistic missile into sea

title: Elon Musk's Twitter rebranded as X. Here's why
description: X said it plans to become an online messaging and payments hub.

title: Police: Six slain, 27 wounded by gunfire over a violent weekend in Chicago
description: The city of Chicago has experienced another bloody and violent weekend as six people were fatally shot and 27 others were wounded by gunfire

title: Biden chooses a longtime Hill aide as his new legislative affairs director
description: President Joe Biden has chosen Shuwanza Goff as his new director of legislative affairs, making her the first Black woman to be the White House’s chief emissary to Capitol Hill

title: Jury in Kevin Spacey's sexual assault trial ends 1st day of deliberations in London
description: The sexual assault trial of Kevin Spacey adjourned without reaching a verdict.

title: Maryland man charged with hate crimes in parking dispute killings
description: A man allegedly killed three people, wounded three more in a parking dispute.

title: Abortion messaging roils debate over Ohio ballot initiative. Backers said it wasn't about that
description: The ballot question turned into a cauldron of misinformation and fear-mongering.

title: Coast Guard searching for cruise passenger who jumped overboard
description: The Coast Guard said it's searching for a man who jumped overboard from a Carnival cruise ship.

title: UN chief urges Russia to revive grain deal with Ukraine, warning 'the most vulnerable' will suffer
description: If it is not revived, "the most vulnerable" will suffer, he warned.

title: Miami-Dade police director in critical condition following incident, officials say
description: Miami-Dade's mayor says the head of the Police Department is in stable condition after surgery in a Tampa area hospital

title: Navalny associate jailed as Russian opposition crackdown continues
description: An associate of imprisoned Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny has been imprisoned on extremism charges as part of the Kremlin's ongoing crackdown on political activists

title: Former U.S. Sen. Kelly Ayotte throws hat into race for New Hampshire governor
description: Former New Hampshire U.S. Sen. Kelly Ayotte has announced she’s running for governor, days after fellow Republican Chris Sununu said he’s not seeking reelection to a fifth term in 2024

title: US heat wave lingers in Southwest, intensifies in Midwest: Latest forecast
description: A deadly heat wave that has persisted for weeks continues to grip a swath of the United States.

title: Israel to vote on divisive judicial overhaul amid protests
description: The Israeli government is set to vote on a controversial judicial overhaul plan pushed by Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu.

title: 2 arrested in Serbia suspected of smuggling, part of an international crime group
description: Serbian police said Monday they have arrested two people suspected of smuggling Cubans toward Spain

title: Police arrest suspect in knife attack on a train in Japan. 3 were slashed and injured
description: Japanese police said Monday that they have arrested a man on suspicion of slashing three people on a train in western Japan

title: 11 killed as roof collapses at middle school gym in China, officials say
description: Chinese authorities say 11 people were killed when a roof collapsed at a middle school gymnasium in the country's far northeast

title: Coast Guard rescues 2 from capsized boat off Georgia coast
description:
A U.S. Coast Guard Air Station Savannah aircrew said it saved two men Sunday morning after their boat capsized
off the coast of Jekyll Island in Georgia.

title: 11 people killed in collapse of roof at Chinese high school
description: Chinese authorities say 11 people were killed in the collapse of a gymnasium roof at a high school in the far northeast

title: Fukushima plant water release raises worries about setbacks to businesses, lives
description: Within weeks, the tsunami-hit Fukushima Daiichi nuclear power plant is expected to start releasing treated radioactive wastewater into the sea, a highly contested plan facing fierce protests in and outside Japan

title: After decades of delays, coal miners hail rule to slow rise of black lung
description: A half-century ago, the nation’s top health experts urged the federal agency in charge of mine safety to adopt strict rules protecting miners from poisonous rock dust

title: New York City’s annual celebration of nudity and artistry
description: It’s last call for New York City’s celebration of baring it all

title: Woman found dead after suspected bear encounter near Yellowstone
description: A woman was found dead after an apparent bear encounter near Yellowstone National Park, according to Montana Fish, Wildlife & Parks.
